structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
Descent And Distribution, Wills, Estates Of Deceased Persons And Absentees, Guardianship, Conservatorship And Trusts

law.text: [Text of section applicable as provided by 2005, 129, Sec. 6.] A trustee shall allocate to income 10 per cent of the receipts from a liquidating asset and the balance to principal.
